name: unconfirmed-cov-notification-multiple-request
description: Represents a BACnet unconfirmed COV (Change of Value) notification multiple request, used to report multiple property value changes without requiring acknowledgment.

fields.name: subscriber-process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier of the subscriber.

fields.name: initiating-device-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the device initiating the notification.

fields.name: time-remaining
fields.description: The time remaining for the subscription, in seconds.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp of the notification. Optional.

fields.name: list-of-cov-notifications
monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the monitored object.

fields.name: list-of-values
property-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property whose value changed.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.

fields.name: property-value
fields.description: The new value of the property.

fields.name: time-of-change
fields.description: The time when the value changed. Optional.
A list of property values that have changed for the monitored object.
A list of COV notifications for monitored objects.
